title: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals by Robert M  Pirsig   - Chapter 29
description:
Now we're going to see how Phaedrus gives evidence that within his own boxcars a fairly linear conception of philosphy actually exists for the MoQ, that of American Pragmatism and Utilitarianism, but with a Quality update again as MoQ addresses the frayed edges and integrates them. 

What is Truth, William?
